title: Episode 284: Hotel Pop Up (Feat. Renni Rucci)
itunes:title: Episode 284: Hotel Pop Up (Feat. Renni Rucci)
description:
This week rapper Renni Rucci is here to promote her upcoming album “Real Bitch Radio.” Renni Rucci gets very open and honest during this episode. The ladies discuss Renni not letting her children visit their father while he was in jail, why she’ll let her man spit in her mouth, but she won’t swallow his load, and much more. Renni even shares a story about popping up on her man and catching him cheating…2 weeks ago! Enjoy!

Have you been craving cereal but you’re tired of it being unhealthy? Problem solved! Make sure to use code LIPSERVICE at checkout when purchasing your healthy and delicious new cereal at MagicSpoon.com/LipService
